description:
Gwen Diamond is our sexy construction worker, trying to get the armory ready for Kink. Sgt. Major sees no reason why every hot sexy female construction worker shouldn’t get tied up.
Gwen plays the damsel in distress to the tee, and the Sgt. plays with his little captive like a pro, ripping endless orgasms from Gwen’s helpless body. A little role-play never hurt anyone.
title: If you're a hot, sexy construction worker working in the armory, you're getting tied up.
